The pure cognitive dissonance in the comments is a sight to behold.  Take out the self-insert ( No, all porn is not self-inserts since people shipping characters aren’t projecting themselves onto them and would defeat the reason for shipping ) and do the whole Erika and Maho pairing and just watch the same people praising the books get mad because they can’t project.  Truly pathetic to say the least.

Fuuuck me... That was one heck of a ride. First time in ages that I did not fap to any doujin series, and 3 parts no less. This was pure art. This conflicted feeling with that ending tho... it hurts dem feels. I'm sad for Maho, but also happy that she can finally do what 'she' wishes to do. Erika also resolved her past and finally accepted her hubby fully. What the fuck is this feeling tho, that feeling that you like and don't like? ...Bittersweet?

This was a really good doujin, really happy the emphasis is on the story telling. The sex doesn't distract from the overall story but is still good enough to be enjoyed for those who want it. The ending where Erika is now happy with her life and children. Then there is Maho, who has a kid is so bittersweet, this is a damn good doujin; just want to reiterate that a a few more times.
This doujin is beautiful.... came here to fap found gold instead
Hell yeah brother its compeleted, too bad theres no next parts to this though but good nonetheless

I like to understand the story about entering 'adulthood'. I believe the title name "Erika" as the German song, not just Erika but also Maho as the "Erika" in the song. Both girls desire love, as Erika never truly confess/receive her love with Maho before her marriage, that make her having gap with her husband and left the house after having second pregnancy.  As for Maho, because of her duty as successor of her family, she have to hide her feeling to focus on her duty not until Miho return and become more suited for the successor role. That left Maho only a 'girl' to follow her love that too late belong to Erika a long time ago. In the end, after the 3-ways, Erika final receive the 'love' from Maho she long desire but also make her understand that is the love she no longer wanted so she choose to return to her husband and her family. As for Maho, she let go the cheating love, the 'successor' and 'cheater' self and she is entering her own 'adulthood'.
